Without T-sigs: 8 data feeds * 17 nodes * 12 updates per hour  = 1,632 Ethereum TXs per hour  -> 39,168 TXs ($5,483) per day  Vs  With T-sigs: 8 data feeds * 17 nodes aggregated * 12 updates per hour = 96 TXs per hour -> 2,304 TXs ($322) per day  That's a huge difference!
